name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Take down your opponents and claim the Martial Arts Championship.  Full version includes all opponents, Xbox Live leaderboards, Multiplayer, and brand new achievements to prove your might.  Will you fight like a tiger or run away in shame? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
